# Lesson goals and objectives

## Learning goals

- Understand the origin of empty droplets, doublets, and ambient signal in single-cell data.

- Describe methods and metrics for identifying artefacts.

## Learning objectives

- Import single-cell data from files into the R session.

- Apply methods to identify empty droplets.

- Apply methods to identify doublets.

- Apply methods to remove ambient noise from single-cell data.
